column5: This is a rustic bunkhouse on a charming 4 acre property.The bunkhouse is close to the main house but positioned so that there is privacy. It is close to great views, restaurants, nightlife, family-friendly activities, the Blanco River, and downtown Wimberley. The bunkhouse is good for couples, solo adventurers, budget travelers and travelers with horses (we have stalls and grounds for horses for an additional fee - message us for details).
column8: Rustic Hill Country Bunkhouse. Bring your horses!
